meanings.definition: To speak again or repeat something previously said.
meanings.sent1: She respeaks the poem to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He respeaks the instructions for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The parrot respeaks the words in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: His echo respeaks his words in the empty cave.
meanings.sent5: The teacher respeaks the lesson to help students understand better.

meanings.definition: To communicate or convey a message verbally.
meanings.sent1: They respeaks their concerns to the manager.
meanings.sent2: The news anchor respeaks the breaking news to the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The phone respeaks the recorded message to the caller.
meanings.sent4: His actions respeak louder than his words.
meanings.sent5: The singer respeaks the emotions through her song.

meanings.definition: To express thoughts or ideas through spoken words.
meanings.sent1: She respeaks her dreams to inspire others.
meanings.sent2: He respeaks his gratitude to everyone who helped him.
meanings.sent3: The comedian respeaks jokes to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: His silence respeaks volumes about his feelings.
meanings.sent5: The poet respeaks the beauty of nature in his verses.
